comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...

comment._content: The Bendigo photographs are of the 1930 annual demonstration by the Country Fire Brigades of Victoria at the Show Grounds, Bendigo. Very descriptive newspaper report here: trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/74051176
